title: Tablet-Based Cross-Curricular Mathematics Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and proficiency in fundamental smartphone usage
context.additional_context: Need for applied mathematics education to enhance social sector job competencies in smartphone-centric environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply mathematical procedures to solve real-world problems through tablet-based cross-curricular activities
Learners can analyze social studies data and interpret visualization results using tablet apps within three months
Learners can demonstrate the ability to connect mathematical concepts with other disciplines through project-based learning activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
